Package io.github.ai4ci.flow

Class StateExporter

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.flow.StateExporter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class StateExporter extends Object implements Closeable
This manages the various files that are being exported to so and their respective threads that the outbreak simulation doesn't have to. It has a single method, export(outbreak, stage), that is called at the different lifecycle
